import React from"react";// Default State of our SnackBar
var position={vertical:"bottom",horizontal:"left"};var DEFAULT_STATE={isOpen:false,// boolean to control show/hide
message:"",// text to be displayed in SnackBar
duration:2000,// time SnackBar should be visible
position:position,close:function close(){},open:function open(props){console.log(props.message,props.duration);},action:React.createElement("div",null)};// Create our Context
export var SnackContext=React.createContext(DEFAULT_STATE);
